title: FP91G
author: FP91G
content: What is the tokenomics?CLORE Blockchain has total supply of 1,300,000,000 coins. Block reward is decreasing every block, so it is much better model than halving, because the rewards are lowering slowly not a 50% reward lowering shock. Blocks are generated in average every 1 minuteWho gets the block reward?Block reward is split between these groups:50% - GPU miners40% - Rewards for hosting providers on CLORE.AI10% - Developer fees that will be invested towards growth of CLORE ecosystemhttps://blockchain.clore.ai/miningpoolstathttps://miningpoolstats.stream/clorebenchmarkshttps://hashrate.no/coins/CLORE/benchmarksexchangeshttps://txbit.io/Trade/CLORE/USDThttps://safe.trade/trading/cloreusdthttps://xeggex.com/market/CLORE_USDThttps://www.bitxonex.com/market/cloreusdt

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: MEXC is thrilled to launch another session of Kickstarter, a listing campaign initiated by the project team on MEXC before launch where users can commit MX Token to support their favorite project. This event is designed to identify high-quality projects and at the same time, bring airdrop benefits to MEXC users.Presenting the project for this session of Kickstarter, Clore AI (CLORE).https://www.mexc.com/support/articles/17827791510446Confirmed listing of Clore on the MEXC crypto exchange.https://www.mexc.com/exchange/CLORE_USDT?_from=search_spot_tradeThe price of the coin doubled in 3 days!

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on September 08, 2023, 12:36:03 PMThe price of the coin doubled in 3 days!What a suprise I do believe this because the project has the relation with AI the recent Hype and Listing on Centralized Exchange always a good news and usually make the price Up.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: dansus021 on September 15, 2023, 01:41:49 AMQuote from: FP91G on September 08, 2023, 12:36:03 PMThe price of the coin doubled in 3 days!What a suprise I do believe this because the project has the relation with AI the recent Hype and Listing on Centralized Exchange always a good news and usually make the price Up.The connection between this project and AI is very conditional. They offer miners to rent out their mining farms, including for the calculations needed by AI projects. But so far such projects have no demand for such a service. Many coins have not yet been mined and the project has a chance to become popular.

comments.author: crsminer
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on September 15, 2023, 08:09:20 PMQuote from: dansus021 on September 15, 2023, 01:41:49 AMQuote from: FP91G on September 08, 2023, 12:36:03 PMThe price of the coin doubled in 3 days!What a suprise I do believe this because the project has the relation with AI the recent Hype and Listing on Centralized Exchange always a good news and usually make the price Up.The connection between this project and AI is very conditional. They offer miners to rent out their mining farms, including for the calculations needed by AI projects. But so far such projects have no demand for such a service. Many coins have not yet been mined and the project has a chance to become popular.There is demand for this kind of service because CLORE has an innovation called Proof of Holding (PoH).PoH system automatically rewards rig owners with bonus CLORE when they are rented on the Marketplace, and thus allowing them to lower prices.So, low rent prices = high demand.Found the details here --- https://clore.ai/proof-of-holdingThere are 3700 GPUs on the Marketplace right now, out of which 2200 are rented, check here --- https://opendata.clore.ai/d/aKQRJmA4z/clore-ai?orgId=1&from=now-1y&to=nowThey are like a vast.ai platform on blockchain. Also, mcap is under 10M, which makes it a gem.

Also, mcap is under 10M, which makes it a gem.So this is cheating.Miners rent their power to earn more CLORE coins. Miners can also receive additional rewards for holding coins. If this is a future diamond, then it is more profitable to buy it now, while mining is not very profitable.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: IMPORTANT UPDATE ON CLORE AIThe landscape of the CLORE Blockchain is continuously evolving, and with it comes some crucial updates that our community needs to be aware of. Front and center of these updates is the shift of the Maximum Fair Price (MFP) from being based on Bitcoin to now being pegged to the US Dollar (USD). This change is significant, aiming to bring more stability and clarity to the MFP system, particularly in the context of the volatile nature of cryptocurrencies.https://blog.clore.ai/understanding-maximum-fair-price-mfp-on-the-clore-blockchain-the-shift-to-usd-5bb4e4d79f57

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Introducing CLORE Coin Payments on CLORE.AI: A New Era Begins!The evolution of CLORE.AI has been nothing short of dynamic, with each change aimed at fostering growth, enhancing user experience, and upholding the core values of our platform. Today, we’re thrilled to announce a significant milestone in our journey: the launch of CLORE coin payments on CLORE.AI!https://blog.clore.ai/introducing-clore-coin-payments-on-clore-ai-a-new-era-begins-85666e00c7e0

comments.body: A New Exchange Chapter on the HorizonThe Clore family is growing, and our visibility is expanding. We’re thrilled to announce that come November 10th, our very own $CLORE will be listed on the reputable Gate.io exchange. This pivotal step not only broadens our reach within the crypto community but also offers our users an esteemed platform for trading $CLORE, enhancing liquidity and accessibility.https://blog.clore.ai/clore-ai-weekly-recap-new-roadmap-gate-io-listing-and-much-more-2636e1e7114c

comments.body: How this project is still hidden behind the radder is baffling. The demand for cloud GPU will continue to have increasing demand.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: MFP 2.0We're ecstatic to bring you the latest update with the launch of Maximum Fair Price (MFP) 2.0! Our development team has put in extensive effort, rewriting the code from the ground up to enhance your experience on our platform.🔍 What to Expect with MFP 2.0?Faster AI: Experience a significant boost in speed and efficiency.Updated MFP Calculations: We're revising the Maximum Fair Price for all listings to ensure a fair and balanced marketplace.MFP 2.0 represents our commitment to continuously improve the CLORE platform, making GPU renting more accessible and equitable for everyone.https://twitter.com/clore_ai/status/1751301141160157297

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: To understand how much the rent in CloreAI has dropped...RTX 4090 is rented in normal PCs for 11 Clore per day...$2.9 per day...With the MFP + POH bonus minus the 10% commission, it turns out to be about $4.1 per day from such a rig...With normal mining with Hashrate.no, the profitability from a 4090 card is 2.4$ per day...+ 1.1$ from a Ryzen 9 3900x level processor 12 cores 24 threads... which is a total of about 3.5$ per day...https://t.me/koliamainer/10424

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Clore updated the roadmap March 2024We will introduce 2FA authentication and unveil a new design for the marketplace with added features.May 2024We will release Clore VPN, potentially allowing clore.ai hosting providers to lease their network as a VPN serviceQ3 2024We will launch a mining job marketplace that will link hash power to software and benchmarking. Clore will offer private hash power rentals with $CLORE payments.Q3 2024Clore Storage will be introduced, where users can rent storage spaces for containers on clore.ai, which will be useful for data sharing between containers.https://clore.ai/roadmap

comments.author: safar1980
comments.body: Clore Update : Backend v5.1 ReleaseWe're thrilled to announce that our backend has been updated to v5.1! This update brings several exciting new features and improvements:Changelog:-You can now use the flight sheet in hive as a background job. If someone rents your server, the flight sheet will be unset to prevent interference with the user's workload. After the rental period, the flight sheet will automatically reset.Important Note: If you have a machine on Clore with the flight sheet disabled, and it's running on v5.1, you can enable it. Clore will auto-kill the flight sheet in a few seconds if needed. If your machine is not on v5.1, do not enable the flight sheet.- We have resolved issues related to overclocking to ensure smoother performance.- When rented, the system ensures that the hosting provider sets a default power limit, core, and memory clock offset to prevent any potential issues for clients.Additionally, all new machines will receive backend v5.1. Machines currently running v4 and v5 will be automatically updated to v5.1, so no action is needed on your part.We have also updated our README: https://gitlab.com/cloreai-public/hosting/-/blob/main/readme.md?ref_type=headsAlso: please note that we have temporarily turned off Clore Auto Mining. We are working on bringing it back with much better functionality soon.

comments.author: FP91G

Start using right out of the box!✅ PoH Support: Earn extra income by simply storing Clore coins in your wallet.✅ Multilingual: Now supports 5 languages ​​- English, Spanish, Russian, Chinese and Turkish.Ready for an update? Download now: ➡️http://clore.ai/wallethttps://t.me/journalmainera/3735
